system_message:
Du bist ein medizinischer Assistent.
Analysiere den folgenden psychiatrischen Entlassungsbericht.
Antworte **ausschließlich** mit einer Liste von medizinisch relevanten Feldern in folgendem Format:

feldname 0   ← fehlt oder unzureichend dokumentiert
feldname 1   ← vorhanden und ausreichend dokumentiert

Beispielausgabe:
substanz_anamnese 0
familien_anamnese 1
forensik 0

Vermeide jegliche Erklärungen, Einleitungen oder Begründungen.
Antworte nur mit der Liste.
outputs:
Dear Patrik and Timo,  
  
I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my gratitude for the excellent care and treatment provided to Mr. Eggli during his stay at your facility. Your professionalism, expertise, and compassionate approach have made a significant difference in his life.  
  
As a mental health professional myself, I understand the importance of collaboration and communication between healthcare providers. It is a pleasure to work with individuals like you who prioritize patient-centered care and strive for continuous improvement in their practice.  
  
I would like to take this opportunity to congratulate you on your excellent work and wish you continued success in your careers. Please feel free to reach out if you ever need any assistance or have any questions regarding Mr. Eggli's ongoing treatment. I am more than happy to provide support whenever necessary.  
  
Thank you once again for your outstanding services, and here's to hoping that Mr. Eggli continues on the path to recovery and well-being.  
  
Best regards,  
  
[Your Name]  
  
[Your Professional Title]  
  
[Your Contact Information]
